attributes.action: Teaching Life Skills in the Secondary School curriculum
attributes.additional_details: We are trying to get Life Skills taught in secondary schools. We surveyed a range of people who all agree that young people lack the skills required in adult life, so we are trying to collect as many signatures as possible to show that we believe that Life Skills should be taught as part of the curriculum. We hoping to get enough signatures to generate some interest and awareness on this subject so young people can have the best start in life.
